name: Martin Spacek
body:
I'm a PhD candidate in Neuroscience at [UBC](http://ubc.ca), in Nick Swindale's [lab](http://swindale.ecc.ubc.ca).

At the moment, I have one project here, [neuropy](http://neuropy.github.com). Eventually, [spyke](http://spyke.github.com) and [dimstim](http://dimstim.github.com) will be posted as well, and my thesis and CV could go here.

Here's my [GitHub](http://github.com/mspacek) account page.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
